content: beautiful seamless edge for 1x1 ribbing there are many different ways to work a tubular co whichever tubular co works for you is the tubular co you should choose the below link offers my two favorite options for the tubular co a regular long tail co works just as well it just will not give a seamless appearance for your co if that is your preference some people find a tubular co looks looser than their actual 1x1 ribbing a smaller needle is recommended for the tubular co if that is the case tubular co https //ysolda com/blogs/journal/tubular-cast-on spit splice https //nimble-needles com/tutorials/how-to-spit-splice-yarn/ cdd https //newstitchaday com/cdd-center-double-decrease-knitting/ carrying yarn up https //rhyflowerknits com/carrying-your-yarn-round note about make it blumchen or other hold along yarns these yarns are designed to be held along with the carrier yarn without adding extra bulk make it blumchen features cute flower sequins it is advised to cast on with color a only then add make it blumchen only after you join for working in the round to reduce tangling it is also advised to choose one shade of make it blumchen the sample did use two colors of each yarn four total balls which creates a more subtle appearance but also required more organization to keep them from twisting on each other images text and pattern © norichan knits 2025 notes and techniques for more details place borm and join for working in the round being careful to not twist your sts body work appropriate 1x1 ribbing pattern until your hat measures 9 / 23cm from co edge if you prefer a shorter brim shorter overall cap such as the fisherman cap or are making this hat for a young child you may want to start trying the hat on with brim folded as long as you d
